com.oneops.proxy.keywhiz.http

Class HttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oneops.proxy.keywhiz.http.HttpClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeywhizAutomationClient, KeywhizClient

    public abstract class HttpClient
extends Object
    An abstract http client for both Keywhiz automation and admin clients.
    Author:
    Suresh

      • createHttpsClient

        protected okhttp3.OkHttpClient createHttpsClient()
                                          throws GeneralSecurityException
        Creates a OkHttpClient to start a TLS connection. The OKHttp logging is enabled if the debug log is enabled for HttpClient.
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException
